title: You can now share YouTube videos directly to Snapchat
content:
Snapchat is the pioneer of the StoryÂ feature that many social media platforms have been copying. The app launched as a convenient tool to send expiring photos and videos to friends. It then started evolving to include more features — such as the map, memories archive, and much more. The latest addition to this (arguably) dying

The post You can now share YouTube videos directly to Snapchat appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Snapchat now supports adding tappable, rich YouTube video links to Snaps. The new feature is rolling out on iOS and Android.
